introStandart: If the card stellactrum fully match the stage's requirments use protocores with the main stat as 'DMG to Weakened' or 'Oath Recovery', otherwise 'CRIT DMG' and 'Expedited Energy'.
introSolar: The way you want to build myth companions is slightly different. For solar pairs β protocore might change depending on the Ranks your have.
chooseProtocores: choose protocores based on your needs

substatsChoice.basic: For substats priorities protocores with ATK, crit rate, CRIT DMG, DMG to Weakened

solarCardsInfo: Solar cards use α (alpha) and β (beta) protocores. α has a fixed main HP stat while β's main stat derives.
lunarCardsInfo: Lunar cards use γ (gamma) and δ (delta) protocores. γ has a fixed main ATK stat while δ's main stat derives.
critBuildsInfo: For crit builds don't forget to check your crit rate before entering the stage. for comfortable ratio aim for 60-80% crit rate. remember your CRIT DMG doesn't matter if you do not utilize it.
OathInfo: Usually your companion will be able to use Oath once during the battle. To use it twice use 'Oath Recovery' for β protocore.
energyInfo: Active skill and Resonance skill require special energy ◆, to regenerate it faster use Expedited Energy for β protocore.
